title: Investigation report - Gaul
raw_html:
The fishing vessel Gaul was lost with 36 lives in the Barents Sea in 1974. The MAIB provided support to the re-opened Formal Investigation that was convened after the wreck of the vessel was found in 1997.

Report name:
Gaul Report Sections 1 to 6
Incident date:
01 January 1999
Category:
Fishing vessels
Summary:
Report on the underwater survey of the Stern Trawler Gaul H and supporting Model Experiments August 1998 - January 1999

body:
The fishing vessel Gaul was lost with 36 lives in the Barents Sea in 1974. The MAIB provided support to the re-opened Formal Investigation that was convened after the wreck of the vessel was found in 1997.

  
Report on the underwater survey of the Stern Trawler Gaul H and supporting Model Experiments August 1998 - January 1999

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (803.75 kb)
